XI.iii.1.D.3.f
.
Costs Associated With Transportation and Placement of a Government Headstone or Marker
The government prepays shipping charges to the extent indicated on
VA Form 40-1330, Claim for Standard Government Headstone or Marker
.
The government does
not
cover the following costs:
transportation of the headstone from the consigneeâ€™s address to the private cemetery, or
erection of the headstone at the grave.
title: M21-1, Part XI, Subpart iii, Chapter 1, Section D  - Memorialization
citation: Part XI, Subpart iii, Chapter 1, Section D
